blogs.title: The Basics
blogs.body: Yoga is a vast collection of spiritual techniques and practices aimed at integrating mind, body and spirit to achieve a state of enlightenment or oneness with the universe.
blogs.author: Ravi

blogs.title: PHILOSOPHY OF YOGA
blogs.body: The main philosophy of yoga is simple: mind, body, and spirit are all one and cannot be clearly separated.
